modName: Warglaive of Azzinoth -The Twin Blades of Azzinoth-
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow] -=WARGLAIVE OF AZZINOTH=-[/color]

[color=red]ENDORSE IT, IF YOU LIKE IT! THANK YOU! [/color]

Warglaive of Azzinoth from WOW```with 2048 hd textures and glow~~

I hope you like it!!!

------------------------------------
And I recommend my [color=yellow]DaggerCraftPackage[/color][color=red] !! 
You can download HERE:[/color]
[color=yellow]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4683/[/color]
------------------------------------

Add The Twin Blades of Azzinoth into skyrim , one is main-hand, another is off-hand
you can create it in daedric smithing list ( need perk!)

These warglaives has magic power of green fire,so you can not enchant them.(if you want to enchant them yourself ,please use v0.2a)

It's Free to improve with grindstones.


you can watch this vedio:
Thanks to Meoni!!
[youtube]L0sDoyFq204[/youtube]

and this vedio:
Skyrim Mods: Week #11 at 2:20
Thanks to MMOxReview !!
[youtube]_D-Z231KFuc[/youtube]




If you do not have materials,you can type
'player.additem XX000d62 1' and
'player.additem XX000d63 1'
to get them```````

XX is the loda order of esp(can find in NMM)


---------------------
[color=red]NOTE!!!!!![/color]
---------------------
[color=red]
you can use this mod to put warglaive on your back[/color]

[color=yellow]1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition by TS
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6276[/color]


---------------------------
ABOUT COPYRIGHT
---------------------------
It's just reference from wow.
DO NOT INCLUDING ANY OF MODLE OR TEXTURES FROM WOW!!


---------------------
Last Version:
---------------------
v0.3
move them to daedric smithing list, and you need to unlock daedric smithing perk to creat them.
you can only creat them with skyfore

add magic power of green fire,and you do not need to charge them (if you want to enchant them yourself , please use v0.2a)


---------------------
v0.2a fix some stuff

add esp need perks' in optional files

add smaller looking version

you can create it in dragon smithing list (do not need perk!)

---------------------
History:
---------------------
v0.2beta
make glaive swordtype
fix problem of view blocking in 1stperson
fix 'squares problem'



------------------------------------------------------
Warglaive of Azzinoth TRADUZIONE ITALIANA by TKratos
------------------------------------------------------

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12498

---------------------
Installation:
---------------------

Extract to skyrim\data\
and enable the ESP in SkyrimLauncher or NMM
